Class ICBIdentity

java.lang.Object
  |

                          |
                          +--com.milk.uberchat.icb.ICBIdentity
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatChannelHolder, ChatEntity, ChatIdentity, ChatLocus, Commandable
public class ICBIdentity
extends BaseIdentity

This is the ChatIdentity class for an ICB identity.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1998-1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

userAdded

protected void userAdded(ChatUser user)
BaseLocus calls this method when a user has been added. We use this to deal with nickname mapping.

Overrides:
userAdded in class BaseLocus
Parameters:
user - the user that was added

userRemoved

protected void userRemoved(ChatUser user)
BaseLocus calls this method when a user has been removed. We use this to deal with nickname mapping, or rather, in this case, unmapping.

user - the user that was removed

doWhoCommand

java.util.Vector doWhoCommand(java.lang.String name)
Do a "who" command on the given channel name. Return the list of users, and do appropriate updates based on the channels returned.

Parameters:
name - the channel name to ask for
Returns:
the list of users

parseWhoLine

static ChatLocus parseWhoLine(MessageEvent msg,
                              ICBIdentity ident)
Parse a line from a who listing, returning either an ICBChannel, an ICBUser, or null. It also automatically updates user and channel info (topic, nickname, etc.).

Parameters:
msg - the message line
ident - the ICBIdentity to use for lookups
Returns:
what it represents
